attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To instruct the police to commence legal proceedings under the Theft Act for those MPs making false claims.  Any member of the public would have been arrested by now for committing similar acts.  Why has no MP been so arrested.  Ignorance nor false accounting is any excuse

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb. Currently, the title of your petition is your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
